name: Goblin King (BlueBean)
description:
A Gambling Rogue-like game. With a deck building system. Play anyway you want today.  Become the goblin king or get addicted to the mini games. You are the goblin, you are the greed!!

____________________________________________________________________________

ALPHA GOLBIN CONTENT:

1 Floor 

3 gambling cards to collect

1 non gambling card to collect

Lots of decks to build!

Perk system introduced
